item.description:
Have you ever felt a connection to rocks and crystals?
Have you ever wondered what it meant or even what to do with them?

Come and join certified Crystal Healer Jen Lang for an introductory class on Crystal Therapy.


This is the first class in a series that will introduce the many facets of crystal healing.

Learn about sensing energies of crystals, basic care and cleansing of crystals and some of the basic crystals that can be used in everyday life!

 

The class is $30.00-

YOU MUST PUT DOWN A $10.00 deposit at the store to reserve your spot                     by Sunday May 19th!

You can drop cash or check at Terrapin Traders, or mail check to:

302 Central St

Gardner, Mass  011440
item.how_to_find_us: Park on the Main St and come in the front door! :)
item.name: Crystal Healing Class
